alert.note: Alert for Upper Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 10:27PM PST until December 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches at pass level with locally higher amounts in the higher elevations. * WHERE...Upper Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is the potential for some freezing rain Saturday night through Sunday morning. This could produce some glaze on surfaces and roadways creating slick conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.

area.areaDesc: Upper Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest
